summary: Adrian Sotomayor is identified as the father of Manuel Marti. Records indicate that Adrian Sotomayor changed his name to Manuel Marti in 1963. FBI reports concerning Adrian Sotomayor dating back to 1953 are referenced in connection with investigations into Manuel Marti. A cover sheet from the 108th Military Intelligence Group (I-SIB) also references ten FBI reports regarding Adrian Sotomayor.
significance: Adrian Sotomayor's significance lies in his connection to Manuel Marti, who is a subject of investigation. The FBI's interest in Adrian Sotomayor, as evidenced by multiple reports dating back to 1953, suggests a potential background or activities that are relevant to the investigation involving his son. The name change adds another layer of complexity.
